name: SurrealPlanet
description:
Story------

You get Abducted by Aliens out of your reality and placed into a strange world just for the purpose of their entertainment.
will you survive? will you be able to escape? will you be able to find your way back home?

Controlls

Forward: W 

BackWard: S

Right: D Left: A
Space to jump
left mouse to shoot.
Hold Escape for 3 seconds to exit.

PreMadeAssets.
SkyBox made in SpaceScape.
Used a Substance Designer file for the planet textures.
AI is using a premade Mesh.
